name: @pbnjam/pvm-assemblyscript
description: PVM implementation in AssemblyScript (compiles to WebAssembly)

scripts.build: npm run build:debug && npm run build:release && npm run copy:wasm
scripts.build:all: npm run build:debug && npm run build:release && npm run build:raw && npm run build:release-mini && npm run build:release-stub && npm run copy:wasm
scripts.copy:wasm: rm -rf ../pvm-invocations/src/wasm && mkdir -p ../pvm-invocations/src/wasm && cp -r build/* ../pvm-invocations/src/wasm/ && node scripts/fix-duplicate-exports.js --target ../pvm-invocations/src/wasm
